snippet: Cristie Kerr made a short par putt on the second hole of a sudden-death playoff with Suzann Pettersen to win the L.P.G.A.’s Kingsmill Championship.
abstract: Cristie Kerr wins sudden-death playoff with Suzann Pettersen to win LPGA's Kingsmill Championship; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cristie Kerr made a short par putt on the second hole of a sudden-death playoff with Suzann Pettersen to win the L.P.G.A.’s Kingsmill Championship.

headline.seo: Cristie Kerr Wins Kingsmill in Playoff
headline.main: Kerr Wins Kingsmill on Second Hole in Playoff
